description: Responsible for building the user-facing side of websites and applications, focusing on layout, styling, and interactivity using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Works on the server-side of web applications, handling databases, server logic, and APIs to ensure smooth data flow and security.
Combines frontend and backend development, responsible for both the client-side and server-side of web applications.
Manages deployment, automation, and operations of software projects, ensuring smooth collaboration between development and IT operations.
Develops applications for mobile devices, ensuring they are optimized for performance, usability, and screen size on both Android and iOS.
Analyzes large datasets to uncover insights and build predictive models, helping organizations make data-driven decisions.
Tests software applications to ensure quality and functionality through manual and automated testing processes.
